channel.title: Hosting with my ISP?
channel.description:
Alright, well my current ISP is Mountain Cable Vision, but they dont allow hosting servers. Recently, a friend of mine got suspended from Mountain Cable for having a server with 20+ people always online for a week. I was wondering if there is ANY way at all that i could host a server without my ISP knowing. From what i know its not possible, but i dont know everything.. It would be great if you could help, thanks for reading.
Mods: If this is not alowwed please simply remove or lock. If not please leave it be, Thanks!

item.title: Hosting with my ISP?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“CookieScape, post:5, topic:349994”]NEVER USE VPSLAND! They run out of a hotel room, and have AWFUL customer service and support. They are by far THE worst VPS company besides Oranhosting.[/quote]I will never buy a vps, im just pointing him to whereever the next person to come to this topic would of pointed him to.

Read full topic
